title: Array of Successive Values
description: In this lab, we will explore how to use the reduceSuccessive() function to apply a given function against an accumulator and each element in an array, returning an array of successively reduced values. We will learn how to use Array.prototype.reduce() to apply the function to the array, and store each new result. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to use these methods to manipulate arrays in JavaScript.

meta.title: Mastering Array Manipulation with Successive Values
meta.description: Explore the power of the reduceSuccessive() function to apply a function to an array, storing each new result.
meta.keywords: successive values, javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, programming tutorial, javascript lab, reduce, javascript tutor, array

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
